text: 9.9 Gal 3.21, Hib 7.18-19, 10.1-2 Pen sel kal agnɨgep anɨb ak, kawnan tek ak tap mɨñɨl apeb okok chɨnop yomub. Sel kal agnɨgep mɨgan ak, kɨli kɨgom yɨmɨl God nop agnɨŋɨd, tap teplep God nop ñɨl, chag meme chag sipsip tap okok dad apɨl, pakɨl God nop sɨbogɨpal. Pen tap anɨb okok kɨlop gek, chɨbol nab kɨli ayaŋ mɨdtep gɨl binɨb teplep ne yenɨgel tek ma lup.
